
Two careless friends reused a prime when generating their RSA keys. They've encrypted the same secret differently. Can you recover the flag from ciphertext1: 5421477837410196489694955059466626461955628306303017915035411351223318990570297372250885636792351062971119259722281317897483730130870188642292406142636361, ciphertext2: 2589578567532876064519029507037542768701222332419697827328101877246236724914376802777083100651424379872579559315534288966880549873145879876592726727566804?


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=8426752034208834073059000706505607813849502064606484233119748424150406052165350516028286445087434812104087726489100694665484865753258390064843237886881177, n2=6578393273191128250025226929816389391564754998718049736932462107205751515276190209027012642593749581152278875628721973950422810608482983610313472573860691, e=5519693401734161010296184015353865697523070910449830208294642783299545027430002236895306112954847346093518772747367906681232356978347646592777256591444697

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{5339jnjq}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5421477837410196489694955059466626461955628306303017915035411351223318990570297372250885636792351062971119259722281317897483730130870188642292406142636361, ciphertext2: 2589578567532876064519029507037542768701222332419697827328101877246236724914376802777083100651424379872579559315534288966880549873145879876592726727566804
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=8426752034208834073059000706505607813849502064606484233119748424150406052165350516028286445087434812104087726489100694665484865753258390064843237886881177, n2=6578393273191128250025226929816389391564754998718049736932462107205751515276190209027012642593749581152278875628721973950422810608482983610313472573860691, e=5519693401734161010296184015353865697523070910449830208294642783299545027430002236895306112954847346093518772747367906681232356978347646592777256591444697
extra_info: p=83279025385458229267047120695233739681691966070534693146096549770519190720127, q=101186967489178514755401920521651976599339678054844981250150917290355424946151, r=65012258361183296105783287640982909486542245516649323622789972041531218543541, φ(n1)=8426752034208834073059000706505607813849502064606484233119748424150406052165166050035411808343412363062870840772819663021359486078862142597782363271214900, φ(n2)=6578393273191128250025226929816389391564754998718049736932462107205751515276024009801162280782888395944116240742636092026851316303610042720981585930371000
